author: Julio Cortez
title: Mississippi businesses shift production during pandemic - Associated Press
description: TUPELO, Miss. (AP) — As the nation hunkers down and people shelter in place amid the coronavirus pandemic, several Mississippi businesses have stayed open, switching gears to make much-needed...
content:
TUPELO, Miss. (AP) As the nation hunkers down and people shelter in place amid the coronavirus pandemic, several Mississippi businesses have stayed open, switching gears to make much-needed products. 
A jeans company is making face guards, a coffeehouse is m… [+3489 chars]
